step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Try to keep your shoulders relaxed and avoid hunching.
You're placing your hands on your abdomen well. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement.
Excellent inhale and muscle tightening! Remember to visualize the fluid moving towards your chest.
Great exhale and muscle relaxation. Keep visualizing pushing the fluid out as you relax.
Good start for the second rep. Continue to keep your shoulders relaxed and avoid tension.
Hands are well-placed. Maintain a smooth, controlled motion throughout the breath.
Well done with the inhale and tightening! Keep that visualization of fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Continue to visualize pushing fluid out as you release tension.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to keep your shoulders relaxed during the inhale and focus on visualizing fluid movement. Continue practicing these smooth breaths to support lymphatic drainage.
